markdown 编辑器

## Examples

### Basic

```yaml preview
- brick: eo-markdown-editor
  properties:
    value: |-
      # Markdown

      > Content.

      ![image.png](data:image/png;base64,)
  events:
    markdown.value.change:
      action: console.log
      args:
        - change
        - <% EVENT.detail %>
    image.upload:
      action: console.log
      args:
        - upload
        - <% EVENT.detail %>
```
